item.title: jvm language preferences poll results
item.description: - Overall results First off, I'd like to thank everyone who voted on this poll. With a total of 236 votes, here is the summary of the first two questions: - Are you currently working with or researching about language alternatives for the JVM? - e.g. JRuby, Scala, Groovy {% img /assets/images/scala_improvements.png %} Tooling. The majority of comment urge for better tooling and IDE support. That simple. - Others
